body_html: @fmassa You mean pytorch implement the Variable's __iadd__ as a in-place add operation while __add__ as a out-of-place add operation, am I understand right? I haven't seen any information about it in the official tutorial.

body: @fmassa You mean pytorch implement the Variable's `__iadd__ `as a in-place add operation while `__add__` as a out-of-place add operation, am I understand right? I haven't seen any information about it in the official tutorial.
